deploy.description: This allows you to control your production environment

port.description: The port to expose the container. Defaults to 8080

protocol.description: The communication protocol http1 or h2c. Defaults to http1.

dns_local_name.description: TLD given to hostnames in the Private Network. Allowed characters are `a-z0-9-.`. Defaults to the slugified Private Network name if created along a GatewayNetwork, or else to `priv`.

dns_servers_override.description: Override the DNS server list pushed to DHCP clients, instead of the gateway itself.

enable_dynamic.description: Whether to enable dynamic pooling of IPs. By turning the dynamic pool off, only pre-existing DHCP reservations will be handed out. Defaults to true.

pool_high.description: High IP (included) of the dynamic address pool. Defaults to the last address of the subnet.

pool_low.description: Low IP (included) of the dynamic address pool. Defaults to the second address of the subnet.

project_id.description: The project_id you want to attach the resource to

push_default_route.description: Whether the gateway should push a default route to DHCP clients or only hand out IPs. Defaults to true.

push_dns_server.description: Whether the gateway should push custom DNS servers to clients. This allows for instance hostname -> IP resolution. Defaults to true.

rebind_timer.description: After how long, in seconds, a DHCP client will query for a new lease if previous renews fail. Must be 30s lower than `valid_lifetime`. Defaults to 51m (3060s).

renew_timer.description: After how long, in seconds, a renew will be attempted. Must be 30s lower than `rebind_timer`. Defaults to 50m (3000s).

valid_lifetime.description: For how long, in seconds, will DHCP entries will be valid. Defaults to 1h (3600s).

pool_high.description: High IP (included) of the dynamic address pool. Defaults to the last address of the subnet.

pool_low.description: Low IP (included) of the dynamic address pool. Defaults to the second address of the subnet.

project_id.description: The project_id you want to attach the resource to

push_default_route.description: Whether the gateway should push a default route to DHCP clients or only hand out IPs. Defaults to true.

push_dns_server.description: Whether the gateway should push custom DNS servers to clients. This allows for instance hostname -> IP resolution. Defaults to true.

rebind_timer.description: After how long, in seconds, a DHCP client will query for a new lease if previous renews fail. Must be 30s lower than `valid_lifetime`. Defaults to 51m (3060s).

renew_timer.description: After how long, in seconds, a renew will be attempted. Must be 30s lower than `rebind_timer`. Defaults to 50m (3000s).

updated_at.description: The date and time of the last update of the public gateway.

valid_lifetime.description: For how long, in seconds, will DHCP entries will be valid. Defaults to 1h (3600s).

zone.description: The zone you want to attach the resource to

created_at.description: The configuration creation date.

gateway_network_id.description: The ID of the owning GatewayNetwork (UUID format).

hostname.description: The Hostname of the client machine.

ip_address.description: The IP address to give to the machine (IPv4 address).

mac_address.description: The MAC address to give a static entry to.

reservation_id.description: The ID of dhcp entry reservation

type.description: The reservation type, either static (DHCP reservation) or dynamic (DHCP lease). Possible values are reservation and lease

updated_at.description: The configuration last modification date.

wait_for_dhcp.description: Wait the the mac address in dhcp entries

zone.description: The zone you want to attach the resource to

created_at.description: The date and time of the creation of the public gateway IP

organization_id.description: The organization_id you want to attach the resource to

project_id.description: The project_id you want to attach the resource to

reverse.description: reverse domain name for the IP address

tags.description: The tags associated with public gateway IP

updated_at.description: The date and time of the last update of the public gateway IP

zone.description: The zone you want to attach the resource to

created_at.description: The date and time of the creation of the PAT rule

gateway_id.description: The ID of the gateway this PAT rule is applied to

organization_id.description: The organization_id you want to attach the resource to

pat_rule_id.description: The ID of the public gateway PAT rule

private_ip.description: The private IP used in the PAT rule

private_port.description: The private port used in the PAT rule

protocol.description: The protocol used in the PAT rule

public_port.description: The public port used in the PAT rule

updated_at.description: The date and time of the last update of the PAT rule

zone.description: The zone you want to attach the resource to
